about_the_game:
Space 2 Book

This Space-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Take to the stars with this scientific book, as each image is inspired by everything out of this world!

Grab your telescope and see what's beyond the atmosphere.

Contents

The Space 2 book unlocks the following images:
  • Comets - 49x49
  • Outer Space - 50x70
  • Astronaut - 58x56
  • Moon Landing - 70x70
  • Saturn V - 70x255
  • Space Walk - 72x79
  • Asteroid - 80x80
  • Perseverance - 85x50
  • Observatory - 92x122
  • Space Dust - 92x122
  • Mars - 100x100
  • There's Coffee in That Nebula - 122x87
  • Saturn V Memory Core - 130x83
  • Earth - 138x141
  • 1-Bit Space - 139x109
  • Constellations - 160x160
  • The Milky Way - 161x120
  • Sol system - 180x64
  • Deep Space - 200x130
  • Blueprint - 201x361

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Space 2 Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
